name: glut.Mor
description:
WASD to move

Left Click to shoot and select

====================================================

glut.Mor is a strategy game where you must shoot red squares.

don't get greedy as the bullets bite back.

you can change the colors in the menu

The game follows the less is more theme because the less bullets on the screen the easier the game is! but only for so long...

Music was created by Artificial intelligence using Ecrett
